help-file.title: "BOUNTY HUNTER"
help-file.content:
The Bounty Hunter uses stealth and wits to lure their victims. They can set traps to locate the enemy and hide themselves more effectively than their unspecialized Mercenary counterparts. With the skill to eavesdrop and their enhanced view of the world, they make excellent scouts.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 30th level: Listen 51st level: Trap
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 31st level: Perception 41st level: Battleaid
